text:
Tigerspike | Android Engineers (mid & senior)| FULL TIME | Sydney, Australia | https://tigerspike.com/

Tigerspike a growing Digital Products company with 10 offices around the world (including London, NY, Dubai & Singapore). We work across a range of industries on consumer & enterprise apps with clients such as Emirates, New Look, The UN & Westfield. Our mission is to 'Improve people's lives through technology'.

Take a look at the role for more details: http://bit.ly/2JKLyai or drop me an email: michelle.coulson@tigerspike.com
